# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(XGC_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(XGC)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
XGCPluginInfo.C
XGCCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
XGCPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
XGCMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtXGCFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
XGCEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtXGCFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IXGCDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IXGCDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IXGCDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MXGCDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MXGCDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MXGCDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MXGCDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EXGCDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EXGCDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EXGCDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EXGCDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EXGCDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EXGCDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EXGCDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EXGCDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases XGC ${INSTALLTARGETS})
